ModMetaData.name: MH: MSE2 Compatibility Patch
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7xuCZqW.png[/img] [h1]Submod for Mechanical Humanlikes: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974536022]Android Tiers Core[/url][/h1] Designed for Rimworld 1.4 Mod Version V1.0 Please consider rating this if you like it! It really helps out. [img]https://i.imgur.com/tE28cZ7.gif[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table] *Always employ [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2921585989]Mid-saver Saver[/url] to remove in the safest way possible.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6o9HyTD.png[/img] This mod adds the Android Race definitions into the dataset to get the full features from Medical System Expansion 2.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qp8JBtZ.png[/img] [h1]Recommended:[/h1] [list] [*]See my Choice Collection [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3151500886]here[/url]! [/list]
[h1]Incompatibilities:[/h1] [list] [*]No known incompatibilities.* [/list]
[u]The following mods are special cases:[/u] *EdB Prepare Carefully eventually breaks all custom pawns; but that's their problem. *Combat Extended does their own compatibility patches; this should be fine if they're patched for ATR.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UN80Om5.png[/img] [h1]Links[/h1] The Repo for this mod can be found here: [url=https://github.com/MasterOfGrey/MH-MSE2-Compat-Patch]GitHub[/url] I hang out in the discord for the main Android Tiers Reforged mod: [url=https://discord.gg/udNCpbkABT]Discord[/url]
[h1]Creators[/h1] OG AT Peeps: * Atlas - The true original creator * ARandomKiwi - Creator of the wonderous and incredible AT++ content and maintainer
MH Team: * RWDevathon - The great balancer * FG_Remastered - PR overlord, diplomat, integral supporter * lazycooken - Jumpstarter and eager supporter * Winterbloom - Graphic and xml supporter
ModMetaData.author: MasterOfGrey
